original_text: They cried and they wept until the evening. They did not eat any food. They were very upset about Saul and Jonathan, and all the Lord's people. They were sad because so many Israelites had died in the battle.
korean_text: 사울과 그의 아들 요나단과 여호와의 백성과 이스라엘 족속이 칼에 죽음으로 말미암아 저녁 때까지 슬퍼하여 울며 금식하니라

sentences.original_text: They did not eat any food
They were very upset about Saul and Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사울과 요나단에 대해 매우 슬퍼했습니다

sentences.original_text: because so many Israelites had died
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너무 많은 이스라엘 사람들이 죽었기 때문입니다
